intro: Hello, and welcome to AmisDrift! (PRESS ENTER TO ADVANCE TEXT)
This tutorial will guide you through the mechanics of the game.
Drive forward to the glowing zone to start.
driving: Use WASD to control your car.
Try clearing this course to proceed.
driving_2: Driving on a road is preferred, as driving on grass slows you down.
Any body of water will instantly respawn you at the nearest checkpoint.
Avoid the grass; try to pass this part without touching it.
controls: You can pause the game with ESC, in case it wasn't obvious.
We'll teach you the most important thing now.
drifting: To drift, hold SPACE while moving.
Nice job! We had to measure your time on that, by the way.
You should've noticed that you accumulated some score from it.
Your time and score determine your rank, given at the end of the map.
You'll unlock more cars as you gain better ranks on maps.
turbe: You're able to use your turbo by holding (left) CTRL.
We only have a limited supply of it per car; the amount is on the bottom left.
The supply regenerates after letting it rest for a while.
